TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MMC_TASK extends System.ValueType

summary.span: Especifica todos los datos necesarios para configurar una tarea individual en un cuadro de tareas.

span.span: Specifies all the data that is required to set up an individual task on a task pad.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información sobre la programación con el complemento MMC\_estructura de la tarea y la Microsoft Management Console (MMC), vea el [Guía del programador de MMC](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).For more information about programming with the MMC\_TASK structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
